column1: When preparing to process the first dead whale, how does Queequeg almost loose his hand?
After the whale carcass is cut loose from the ship, who are the “mourners” at its “funeral?”
When the crew takes a break from whale-processing, who does Ahab go on deck to talk to?
When the crew encounter the crazed prophet Gabriel, what does Gabriel prophesize as Ahab's fate?
According to Fedallah, why should you hang a sperm whale's head on one side of a ship and a right whale's on the other?
